todos.title: FOCUS GROUPS
todos.body: They tell you what they think you want to hear to sound smart and not what they believe.  Best size of group is 5 people.  Better to inject yourself in their lives and learn.  Shadow your customers.

todos.title: STRENGTH SELLS
todos.body: Smart and powerful people will test you.

todos.title: DRIVE
todos.body: Passion and drive are in the eyes.

todos.title: THIRTY FIVE PERCENT RULE
todos.body: It is better to have thirty five percent of people super charged about your product than 100% who don’t really care.

todos.title: REACH OUT
todos.body: If you can’t be at a client meeting, reach out before and/or after.

todos.title: CUSTOMERS
todos.body: He who owns the customers/tenants, owns the market.

todos.title: EVOCATIVE V LITERAL
todos.body: Evocative names and brands are tougher to start but hold their value better because the product defines the name, not vice versa.

todos.title: SIMPLE
todos.body: Everything can be summarized in a sentence.

todos.title: SUNSHINE, LIGHTNING, THUNDER
todos.body: Enter any room in your organization with one of the three and change the energy immediately (nobody likes cloudy and rainy).

todos.title: ZIG ZAG THEORY
todos.body: Don’t look at other people’s work, no matter how good it is.  You want to zag from what everyone else is doing and not create a watered down replica.

todos.title: HUMOR
todos.body: As a small company, gain attention with humor.
